name: The 5th Int'l Conference on Aging and Gerontology
content: The 5th Int'l Conference on Aging and Gerontology (ICAG 2024) will be held during May 31-June 2, 2024, in Kunming, China. ICAG 2024 will cover issues on Aging and Economic Perspectives, Physical Wellness & Healthcare, Sensory Decline, The Immune System and Aging: Immunological Changes, Alzheimer's Disease and Prevention,Declines in Hearing Acuity and Hearing Loss, Emotion Recognition. It dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods.
